input.sentences: i learned so much in my `` art is everywhere '' class .
even the simplest things | such as this empty lot | can hold beauty and design .
this graffiti is a true piece of art !
if this old car could speak | i bet it would have some pretty interesting stories .
i wish everyone could see the beauty in all the ordinary things they see every day !
output.sentences: I learned about sophistication when I took a class in building 818 about modern art.
I discovered that even the simplest things can have a lot of heart and hold true beauty.
One true piece of art that is commonly seen in big cities is graffiti.
Art is basically stories - some speak loudly, while the others' messages are not pretty.
I learned that even ordinary things can some day, in some way, be objects of beauty.
